en.title: Who are we?
en.subtitle: Our mission: make fitness simple and accessible for everyone
en.description: Harmonith was built to make fitness simple, fun, and accessible. Choose your exercises, tweak the load, reps, or cardio time, and track your progress with ease.

team.name: Moha
team.bio: A code enthusiast (and proud lazy-mode advocate), Moha designed Harmonith to take the friction out of fitness. Blending a passion for development with love for training, the goal is an app that adapts to meâ€¦ and to you.

team.name: Nono
team.bio: Hooked on writing and fitness, Nono helps keep Harmonith clear, inspiring, and motivating. The aim: turn information into helpful, energizing content so everyone feels ready to push further.

team.name: Chems
team.bio: Energetic and creative, Chems brings the Harmonith community to life every day. Between motivation, sport, and team spirit, the goal is to connect people and inspire everyone to go furtherâ€”together.

values.title: Simplicity first
values.description: A clean, intuitive interface: pick your exercises, tweak the details, and start your session in seconds.

values.title: Progress you can see
values.description: Track weight, reps, and cardio in real time. Watch your progress build week after week.

values.title: Fully customizable
values.description: Your programme, your rules. Target muscle, available gear, daily goalâ€”the app adapts to you.
